member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.OnError
member.summary: Error event. Do not call functions on the device from this thread. If it is necessary to restart capture from this event, invoke function calls on the main thread.

member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.OnReadData
member.summary: Read data event. Only needed when reading using the ReadStart function.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.Stop
member.summary: Stops the current operation.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.ReadStart
member.summary: Begins data capture. Data is available from the OnReadDataDelegate callback.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.GetChannelCount
member.summary: Returns the number of channels the device uses.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.GetSupportedSampleRates
member.summary: Returns a list of available sample rates.

member.name: P:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.Use5Volts
member.summary: Gets or sets which I/O voltage standard to use. false = 1.8V to 3.6V. true = 3.6V to 5.0V

member.name: P:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.CaptureChannels
member.summary: Gets or sets the channels used in the next capture

member.name: P:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.SampleRateHz
member.summary: Gets or sets the device sample rate in Hz.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.IsStreaming
member.summary: Returns true if the device is actively sampling. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16.IsUsb2pt0
member.summary: Returns true if the device is connected over USB 2.0. Returns false if using USB 1.1.

member.name: T:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic16
member.summary: Represents a Saleae Logic 16 device.

member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.OnError
member.summary: Error event. Do not call functions on the device from this thread. If it is necessary to restart capture from this event, invoke function calls on the main thread.

member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.OnWriteData
member.summary: Write data event. Only needed when writing using the WriteStart function.

member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.OnReadData
member.summary: Read data event. Only needed when reading using the ReadStart function.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.SetOutput(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a single sample to the logic analyzer.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.GetInput
member.summary: Captures a single sample from the logic analyzer.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.Stop
member.summary: Stops the current operation.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.WriteStart
member.summary: Begins data output. Data is written during the OnWriteDataDelegate callback. Continuous output is only insured with output rates below 4 MHz.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.ReadStart
member.summary: Begins data capture. Data is available from the OnReadDataDelegate callback.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.GetChannelCount
member.summary: Returns the number of channels the device uses.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.GetSupportedSampleRates
member.summary: Returns a list of available sample rates.

member.summary: Gets or sets the device sample rate in Hz.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.IsStreaming
member.summary: Returns true if the device is actively sampling. Otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic.IsUsb2pt0
member.summary: Returns true if the device is connected over USB 2.0. Returns false if using USB 1.1.

member.name: T:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MLogic
member.summary: Represents a Saleae Logic device.

member.name: E:SaleaeDeviceSdkDotNet.MSaleaeDevices.OnDisconnect
member.summary: Device disconnected event.

member.summary: Logic 16 connected event. Required to access connected devices.

member.summary: Logic connected event. Required to access connected devices.
